articles.author: Clare Watson
articles.title: Scientists Discover Brain Circuit That Could Explain How Placebos Ease Pain - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Placebos offer the tempting possibility of pain relief without drugs or surgery, largely relying instead on expectations that pain will go away.
articles.content:
Placebos offer the tempting possibility of pain relief without drugs or surgery, largely relying instead on expectations that pain will go away.
As intangible and elusive as that sounds, the placebo… [+4355 chars]
